DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate effect FTY720 lung function patient moderate asthma
DOC.brief_title: A Study Effect FTY720 Pulmonary Function Patients With Moderate Asthma
DOC.criteria: Forced Expiratory Volume 1 second least 60 % History asthma least 6 month Current use shortacting beta agonist , inhale longacting beta agonist inhale corticosteroid ( specify dose ) History lung disease asthma Smokers Use inhale corticosteroid specify dose Use oral beta agonist corticosteroids asthma medication Hypersensitivity drug Respiratory tract infection within 1 month study Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criterion may apply
DOC.keyword: Asthma , adrenergic beta agonist , multiple sclerosis , pulmonary function test , force expiratory volume
